author: JÃ¼rgen MÃ¼ller

sections.description:
Just another mask!
A very lightweight extension for the core/group gutenberg block.
This adds an option, under the group blocks style tab, to add different top or bottom masks to a group block.
You will love it. ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/easy-mask directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
I installed the plugin, what now?

In gutenberg editor, e.g. add an image, and put it inside of a group block.
Under the Styles tab of the group block, a new option Masks has appeared.
Add a top mask and/or a bottom mask, and play with the settings.

short_description: Boring straight lines? Add option to mask the core/group block with waves, slopes, spikes etc. A very lightweight extension for the core group block.
